turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, would you mind ordering me a coffee from Starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, no problem. Which Starbucks do you want me to place the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one in downtown Trenton.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay. I'll do that right away. What do you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm thinking a salted caramel mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Salted caramel mocha latte or frappacinno?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a frappacinno.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. What size do you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I don't think so. Feel free to get something for yourself and put it on my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, thank you. Do you want whipped cream in your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And do you want extra caramel or no?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I should be good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good. And you want me to place that order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, as soon as you can please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. I'll call it in now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make sure they put it under my name.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Actually, can you pick it up for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd get it myself but I'm not sure what time I'm getting out of this meeting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, no problem. I can pick it up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, remember to have them put it on my account.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay will do.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome.
